name: eat_git_and_fit_80-20
description: Eat Git And Fit - Web Application =================== It's a web application that offers a collection of healthy recipes. Inspired by model 80/20 which means healthy but no strict diet. It's a place where you can find recipes according to meal type, occasion, region or ingredients. For registered and logged-in users, there are additional features, including the ability to add, save, and edit their own recipes.
